channel.title: Checking Boxes on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Checking Boxes on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: No, Trump Can’t Legally Federalize US Elections
item.description: The United States Constitution is clear: President Donald Trump can’t take control of the country’s elections. But he can sow confusion and fear.
